House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Oceanography and Great Lakes.

official_title: To encourage boating and maritime safety and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires, notwithstanding specified provisions of Federal law, the price of a nautical chart or other product created or published by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration and sold after enactment of this Act be the price in effect on April 7, 1986. Makes that requirement not apply if a report regarding currently-mandated price increases, due April 7, 1989, is submitted to the Congress by May 28, 1990.

titles.title: To encourage boating and maritime safety and for other purposes.
